DataElement.preferredName: Southwest Oncology Group Patient Minimal Residual Disease Diagnostic Procedure Consent Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator whether a person participating in a Southwest Oncology Group clinical trial, an NCI-sponsored adult cancer clinical trials organization, has given consent to be evaluated to determine the if minimal residual disease, remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy, is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Southwest Oncology Group Patient Minimal Residual Disease Diagnostic Procedure Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the consent of person participating in a Southwest Oncology Group clinical trial, an NCI-sponsored adult cancer clinical trials organization, to be evaluated to determine the if minimal residual disease, remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy, is present.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The Southwest Oncology Group (SWOG) is an NCI-sponsored cooperative group, an adult cancer clinical trials organization, one of the largest in the world. The group was established in 1956 and is headquartered in San Antonio, TX. Its network consists of almost 4,000 of the physicians at 283 institutions throughout the US and Canada. The major goal of the SWOG since 1990 has been to enroll more women and minority patients in cancer treatment and control research trials.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: An NCI-sponsored cooperative group, an adult cancer clinical trials organization, one of the largest in the world. The group was established in 1956 and is headquartered in San Antonio, TX. Its network consists of almost 4,000 of the physicians at 283 institutions throughout the US and Canada. The major goal of the SWOG since 1990 has been to enroll more women and minority patients in cancer treatment and control research trials.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Diagnostic Procedure Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Evidence for remaining tumor following primary treatment that is only apparent using highly sensitive techniques.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree to have my specimens
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to have my specimens submitted for MRD Testing.
